webscript.shortname: Add a Custom Reference Definition to the custom model
webscript.description:
Adds a custom reference definition to the custom model. If the reference definition is
for an already existing reference, it may not be possible to apply the changes. If there
are already instances of the reference, it may not be possible to change the model.

The body of the post should be in the form, e.g.
{
   "name" : "sampleCustomReference",
   "referenceType" : ""parentchild" OR "bidirectional",
   "source" : "foo",
   "target" : "bar"
   "label" : "bar"
}
For parentchild references, source and target must be provided. For bidirectional references, a label is required.
